meanings.definition: Ornamental work of fine wire formed into delicate tracery
meanings.sent1: The filagreeing on the jewelry was so intricate.
meanings.sent2: She admired the filagreeing on the antique necklace.
meanings.sent3: The filagreeing on the gate made it look like a fairy entrance.
meanings.sent4: The filagreeing of vines on the fence seemed to come alive.
meanings.sent5: The filagreeing added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.sent1: He spent hours filagreeing the cake with frosting.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed filagreeing her notebooks with doodles.
meanings.sent3: The chef had fun filagreeing the dessert with chocolate drizzle.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filagreeing the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The artist filagreeing the canvas with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The art of creating delicate and intricate designs with metal wire
meanings.sent1: Learning filagreeing requires patience and precision.
meanings.sent2: The workshop focused on the history of filagreeing.
meanings.sent3: The competition showcased stunning filagreeing pieces.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a master at filagreeing intricate patterns.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed exquisite examples of filagreeing art.
